name: GOODWILL FOUNDATION
briefDescription: GOODWILL FOUNDATION WORKS IN VARIOUS FIELDS LIKE PROTECTING THE ENVIRONMENT BY PLANTING TREES IN SCHOOL PREMISES, ROADSIDES; HELPING THE AGED DESTITUTE PEOPLE BY WAY OF DISTRIBUTING WOOLEN CLOTHS, CELEBRATING WORLD WIDOW'S DAY ETC. IT IS ALSO WORKING IN THE FIELD OF SWACH BHARAT ABHIYAN OF PM MR. NARENDRA MODI.
